Released: 5 December 2025

This is a minor release of PGD 4 for customers on an Extended Life Support contract. This release is a prerequisite for upgrading to PGD 6.2.0+. This release also includes a number of bug fixes. 

## Bug Fixes

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Component</th><th>Version</th><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>BDR</td><td>4.4.1</td><td><details><summary>Fixed an issue to ensure that the values of <code>node_uuid</code> and <code>node_kind</code> of a node are preserved after joining a cluster in a different PGD version.</summary><hr/><p>This bug caused the <code>node_uuid</code> in system tables (<code>bdr.local_node</code> and <code>bdr.node</code>) to diverge after a full cluster upgrade. The fix ensures that the joining node's UUID and kind are correctly preserved throughout the process.</p>
</details></td><td></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
